text: Halmstad BTK is a table tennis club in Halmstad, Sweden. It was established on 27 October 1937. The club won the Swedish national men's team championship in 1993 and 2003 and the Swedish women's national team championship in 1991, 1992, 1995 and 1996. Jörgen Persson and Åsa Svensson have played for the club. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1937 establishments in Europe Category:Table tennis clubs in Sweden Category:1930s establishments in Sweden Category:Sport in Halmstad
title: Halmstad BTK
